org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.query.aggregate

Interface AdapterAndIndexBasedAggregation<P extends Persistable,R,T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Aggregation<P,R,T>, Persistable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseOptimalVectorAggregation, OptimalVectorBoundingBoxAggregation, OptimalVectorTimeRangeAggregation

    public interface AdapterAndIndexBasedAggregation<P extends Persistable,R,T>
extends Aggregation<P,R,T>

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods

      default void fromBinary(byte[] bytes)
      Because the serialization of aggregation is just the function without the parameters or the result, its expected that there's nothing to deserialize

      Returns a persistable object for any parameters that must be persisted to properly compute the aggregation

      • getResult

        default R getResult()
        Description copied from interface: Aggregation
        Get the current result of the aggregation. This must be mergeable and it is the responsibility of the caller to merge separate results if desired. It is the responsibility of the aggregation to start with a new instance of the result at the beginning of any aggregation.
        Specified by:
        getResult in interface Aggregation<P extends Persistable,R,T>
